page.title: 12A Day in the Life
page.content: {1)CHILD:}Get up from bed at{9.00 am Have{breakfast}consisting of{cereals, {milk,fruit juice,toast,coffee}and watch{television}usually{cartoons}and items of{every day}interest.{11.00 call for some{friends}and go{swimming at the{local baths. 12.30}leave{baths, walk home{via}the{town,}browse through the{shops}and{go home}for{lunch.}After {lunch}play with{friends,}such{games}as {hide and seek,football,tigs}and {cricket}until{early evening.}Evening watch{favourite action}and {entertainment}T.V.programmes,bath, {supper,read}and then{bed.
